scripts.setup: npm run dev-link-tns-platform-declarations && npm run dev-link-tns-core-modules && npm run dev-link-tests && npm run dev-link-apps
scripts.dev-tsc-all: npm run dev-tsc-tns-platform-declarations && npm run tsc && npm run dev-tsc-tests && npm run dev-tsc-apps
scripts.dev-link-tests: cd tests && npm link tns-platform-declarations && npm link tns-core-modules
scripts.dev-link-apps: cd apps && npm link tns-platform-declarations && npm link tns-core-modules
scripts.dev-declarations: npm run setup && rm -rf tns-platform-declarations/ios/objc* && TNS_TYPESCRIPT_DECLARATIONS_PATH=$PWD/tns-platform-declarations/ios/objc tns build ios --path tests
scripts.test: npm run test-android && npm run test-ios
scripts.pretest: npm run setup && npm run tsc
scripts.test-watch-android: npm run pretest && concurrently --kill-others "npm run tsc-tiw" "tns livesync android --path tests --watch"
scripts.test-watch-ios: npm run pretest && concurrently --kill-others "npm run tsc-tiw" "tns livesync ios --path tests --watch"
scripts.dev-typedoc: npm run typedoc && cd bin/dist/apiref && http-server
